```{ojs}
function color_accepted(d) {
  const backgroundColor = d === "Accepted" ? "#5f9c5f" : "#fc4747";
  return html`<div style="background: ${backgroundColor};text-align:right;padding:2px 5px;">${d}</div>`;
}
```
